      static boolean TileEntityHopper.putDropInInventoryAllSlots​(IInventory source, IInventory destination, EntityItem entity)
      Attempts to place the passed EntityItem's stack into the inventory using as many slots as possible.
      static ItemStack TileEntityHopper.putStackInInventoryAllSlots​(IInventory source, IInventory destination, ItemStack stack, EnumFacing direction)
      Attempts to place the passed stack in the inventory, using as many slots as required.
